Title: Chief's Diary
Text:
Chief's Special Message Touchpad, Be Smart and Don't Move
Date: I don't know
There seems to be a goon who didn't show up today, what's his name, Zhi Yan? Let's see how I'll clean him up when I get back. A few other officers are shrinking, even Morri Cow is afraid, but I have to rely on the boss me to step in, hmmm.
I came across a broken-down house where they could dispose of the meat before taking it away. These guys dawdled for half a day and still haven't finished, don't attract the maned wolves later ......
